::: {#about style="text-align: justify"}
I am passionate about the intersection between Economics and Data Science. Experienced in Competition Economics and Quantitative Research. Currently working as a Junior Data Consultant at [FactX](https://factx.nl/), where I engage in diverse projects across different industries. Oriented toward analytical and interdisciplinary work, with high learning opportunities.
:::
